Modified::
Heavily

This changes are focusing on make L1Z1X more distinct than just a generic fighty faction (see Letnev which already fills that niche).
- The old commander aiblity, which lets L1Z1x bypass planetary shield, is now moved to their Dreadnought upgrade.
- Their old Harrow ability now becomes their commander. It is unlikely to see use in the early game, and now gives L1 something good to sell.
- Two new faction abilities related to exhausting planets, to give L1 some more mechanical flavour.
- They now sport a new promissory note that lets them grant immunity to their new abilities, if they want to take the diplomatic route.
- They now start with an extra technology to bring them closer to their two faction technologies.
- Finally, a carrier in their starting fleet has been replaced with a dreadnought to highlight their dreadnought's extra capacity, and setting them apart from other factions.

Modified::
Moderately:

- Their Reclamation ability now allows them to build immediately after taking Mecatol Rex.
- Their Lazax Gate Folding technology now has 1 fewer prerequisite, making it easier to pick up when you need it.
